Meets synchronously online Thursdays, 9:40-10:55am EST
**ENVS majors and minors: contact Dr. Donaher (shaunna.donaher@emory.edu) for overload permission.**
course_description: Introduction to environmental sciences through overarching hot-button research topics in earth science, ecology, resilience, and sustainability. Human impact on the environment will be discussed and debated through interdisciplinary analysis of case studies. Appropriate for majors and non-majors.
